title: Solr Index Partition by Timestamp(day)
description:
I am using Solr Cloud for indexing a big amount of log data files. Should it be necessary to partition the index? We have thought about partitioning the index by timestamp(day).
I have not found any document about how to partition an Index in Solr Cloud by different components(day, hour...) of a timestamp.
How that should be done?

comments.content:
Hi,
This issue is filed as a question; if you have a question then ask on the mailing list.
As it so happens, time partitioned collections are being worked on right now via SOLR-11299
comments.author: David Smiley
